sourcesContent:
Home About Contact Login Register
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-navigation', templateUrl: './navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./navigation.component.css'] }) export class NavigationComponent { isAuthenticated: boolean = !!localStorage.getItem('isAuthenticated'); constructor(private router: Router) {} handleLogout(): void { localStorage.removeItem('isAuthenticated'); this.router.navigate(['/login']); } }
